events.name: NATO to strengthen military presence in Europe
events.wd_label: NATO to strengthen military presence in Europe
events.wd_description: NATO will increase its military presence across Europe in response to the war between Russia and Ukraine, deploying new US warships to Spain, fighters to the UK, and ground soldiers to Romania.
events.description: NATO will increase its military presence across Europe in response to the war between Russia and Ukraine, deploying new US warships to Spain, fighters to the UK, and ground soldiers to Romania.

events.name: Jens Stoltenberg's statement
events.wd_description: NATO leader Jens Stoltenberg announced that the organization is undergoing its largest revamp since the Cold War, with over 300,000 troops on high readiness alert next year, up from the current 40,000.
events.description: NATO leader Jens Stoltenberg announced that the organization is undergoing its largest revamp since the Cold War, with over 300,000 troops on high readiness alert next year, up from the current 40,000.

events.name: US military presence
events.wd_description: The US will enhance its presence across Europe, especially in eastern Europe where its 5th Army Corps will be headquartered.
events.description: The US will enhance its presence across Europe, especially in eastern Europe where its 5th Army Corps will be headquartered.

events.name: Biden's statement
events.wd_description: President Biden emphasized that NATO is needed more than ever, reiterating that an attack on one member is an attack on all.
events.description: President Biden emphasized that NATO is needed more than ever, reiterating that an attack on one member is an attack on all.

events.name: NATO's view on Russia
events.wd_description: NATO identified the Russian Federation as the biggest threat to partners' security and Euro-Atlantic peace and stability.
events.description: NATO identified the Russian Federation as the biggest threat to partners' security and Euro-Atlantic peace and stability.

events.name: Devastating flood in Kabul, May 2022
events.wd_description: A devastating flood in Kabul and 12 other provinces resulted in 22 deaths, 40 injuries, and widespread destruction of homes and crops amid an ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan.
events.description: A devastating flood in Kabul and 12 other provinces resulted in 22 deaths, 40 injuries, and widespread destruction of homes and crops amid an ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan.

events.name: Impact on Kabul and provinces
events.wd_description: The flood severely affected 12 provinces, with the worst impact in Badghis, Fyrab, and Baghlan, leading to 22 deaths, 40 injuries, destruction of 500 houses, and loss of 3000 acres of crops.
events.description: The flood severely affected 12 provinces, with the worst impact in Badghis, Fyrab, and Baghlan, leading to 22 deaths, 40 injuries, destruction of 500 houses, and loss of 3000 acres of crops.

events.name: Humanitarian crisis and response
events.wd_description: The ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan worsened due to the flood, with the Red Cross providing aid while the international community grapples with how to assist without legitimizing the Taliban.
events.description: The ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan worsened due to the flood, with the Red Cross providing aid while the international community grapples with how to assist without legitimizing the Taliban.

events.name: Public session on Pacific weather patterns, June 2022
events.wd_label: Public session on Pacific weather patterns, June 2022
events.wd_description: US-based scientist Dr. Mike McPhaden held a public session in Sydney to discuss the current state of the Pacific, focusing on the potential for a rare triple La Niña event and its implications for Australia’s weather.
events.description: US-based scientist Dr. Mike McPhaden held a public session in Sydney to discuss the current state of the Pacific, focusing on the potential for a rare triple La Niña event and its implications for Australia’s weather.

events.name: Discussion on El Niño and La Niña
events.wd_label: Discussion on El Niño and La Niña
events.wd_description: The session covered the significance of surface temperatures in the Nino 3.4 region of the tropical Pacific Ocean in determining the occurrence of El Niño or La Niña events.
events.description: The session covered the significance of surface temperatures in the Nino 3.4 region of the tropical Pacific Ocean in determining the occurrence of El Niño or La Niña events.

events.name: Potential triple La Niña
events.wd_description: Dr. McPhaden highlighted the rarity of a triple La Niña, which could continue into 2023, bringing increased rainfall and lower temperatures to Australia’s east coast.
events.description: Dr. McPhaden highlighted the rarity of a triple La Niña, which could continue into 2023, bringing increased rainfall and lower temperatures to Australia’s east coast.

events.name: Role of global heating in weather events
events.wd_label: Role of global heating in weather events
events.wd_description: The session also touched on the potential influence of global heating on the current and future weather events, though scientists are still studying its impact on storm activities.
events.description: The session also touched on the potential influence of global heating on the current and future weather events, though scientists are still studying its impact on storm activities.

events.name: GM Cobalt Sourcing Agreement
events.wd_description: GM has signed a multi-year sourcing agreement for cobalt supply from Glencore’s mining operation in Australia to support its EV battery production.
events.description: GM has signed a multi-year sourcing agreement for cobalt supply from Glencore’s mining operation in Australia to support its EV battery production.

events.name: Cobalt Supply Agreement
events.wd_description: GM signed a multi-year sourcing agreement with Glencore for cobalt from their mining operation in Australia.
events.description: GM signed a multi-year sourcing agreement with Glencore for cobalt from their mining operation in Australia.

events.name: Use in Ultium Batteries
events.wd_description: The cobalt sourced from Australia will be used in GM’s Ultium battery cathodes for models like the Chevrolet Silverado EV, GMC Hummer EV, and Cadillac LYRIQ.
events.description: The cobalt sourced from Australia will be used in GM’s Ultium battery cathodes for models like the Chevrolet Silverado EV, GMC Hummer EV, and Cadillac LYRIQ.

events.name: Responsible Sourcing Initiative
events.wd_description: Both GM and Glencore are members of the Responsible Minerals Initiative, focusing on secure and sustainable sourcing of critical raw materials.
events.description: Both GM and Glencore are members of the Responsible Minerals Initiative, focusing on secure and sustainable sourcing of critical raw materials.
